bugs.title: Bio field accepts more than 500 character limit
bugs.description: The Bio field in user profile edit page allows inputting more than 500 characters. The character counter shows values exceeding the limit (e.g., '757/500') without enforcing validation or preventing form submission with oversized content.
steps_to_reproduce: Paste or type 1000+ characters of text
bugs.fix: Added maxLength={500} to Bio TextInput and validation check in handleSave function in edit-profile.tsx

bugs.title: Long names accepted in registration without visual truncation notice
bugs.description: Registration form accepts names longer than reasonable limits (tested with 1000 character 'a' string). While the UI truncates display to 100 characters, the backend appears to store the full string without clear user feedback about limits.
steps_to_reproduce: Enter 1000+ character name in Full Name field
bugs.fix: Already fixed - register.tsx has maxLength={100} on Input and validation for name.length > 100

bugs.title: Edit Profile button doesn't open modal on companion dashboard
bugs.description: On the Date Companion dashboard, clicking 'Edit Profile' button doesn't open an edit form/modal. The button becomes active/highlighted but no UI changes occur.
steps_to_reproduce: Click 'Edit Profile' button in profile section
Observe: Button activates but no modal/form opens
bugs.fix: Added router.push('/settings/edit-profile') to Edit Profile button onPress in female/profile.tsx

bugs.title: Update Rates button doesn't open settings modal
bugs.description: On the Date Companion dashboard, clicking 'Update Rates' button doesn't open a rate editing modal. Similar to Edit Profile issue.
steps_to_reproduce: Click 'Update Rates' button in Quick Actions
Observe: Button activates but no modal/form opens
bugs.fix: Added onPress prop to ActionCard component and connected Update Rates button to /settings/edit-profile in female/index.tsx
